application_credentials.description:
Follow these steps to create a Smartcar application and obtain your credentials:

1. Visit [Smartcar Dashboard](https://dashboard.smartcar.com)
2. Create a new application
3. Set redirect URI to: `https://my.home-assistant.io/redirect/oauth`
4. Copy your Client ID and Client Secret

For detailed instructions, see [setup guide]({more_info_url})
